sentence:
Even though many patients lack a family history consistent with a cancer predisposition syndrome,3 some clues can help us suspect a germline mutation in patients with a hematologic malignancy (Figure 1).6 In particular, several associated clinical features may point toward specific syndromes (Table 1).6
Figure 1.
